entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.25.8
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Database was not being created if it didn't exist. #1076

Removed

  • RAILS_MASTER_KEY environment variable is no longer being set. You can safely remove it from your environment variables.

üíô This release is supported by Steven B., James Manolios, chenrik, aldumil, derpderpington, Chippie, dint, jhalpern, Lex Fradski, Schlufo, cyberswan.at, craftyklaus, JMyrng, Andre, hogenf, naraxius, Lemur, Embrace, martin4861, Alex, evetters and Jonah B. on Patreon üíô

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.25.10
entry.content:
Added

  • Vector maps are supported in non-self-hosted mode.
  • Credentials for Sidekiq UI are now being set via environment variables: SIDEKIQ_USERNAME and SIDEKIQ_PASSWORD. Default credentials are sidekiq and password. If you don't set them, in self-hosted mode, Sidekiq UI will not be protected by basic auth.
  • New import page now shows progress of the upload.

Changed

  • Datetime is now being displayed with seconds in the Points page. #1088
  • Imported files are now being uploaded via direct uploads.
  • /api/v1/points endpoint now creates accepted points synchronously.

Removed

  • Sample points are no longer being imported automatically for new users.

üíô This release is supported by Steven B., James Manolios, chenrik, aldumil, derpderpington, Chippie, dint, jhalpern, Lex Fradski, Schlufo, cyberswan.at, craftyklaus, JMyrng, Andre, hogenf, naraxius, Lemur, Embrace, martin4861, Alex, evetters, GregF, Jon Coffee, Lukas, Robbie G, Kilian, Hans G, Chris, tabaha, Andre, Michael C and Jonah B. on Patreon and KoFi üíô

What's Changed

  • Feature/pmtiles by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1129
  • Feature/dokku deployment by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1130
  • Fix/protomaps leaflet by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1134
  • Refactoring/syncronous points by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1135
  • feat(build): add oci labels by @Saschl in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1139
  • Bump strong_migrations from 2.2.0 to 2.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1144
  • Bump rails from 8.0.1 to 8.0.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1145
  • 0.25.10 by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1131

New Contributors

  • @Saschl made their first contribution in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1139

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.25.9...0.25.10

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.26.0
entry.content:
‚ö†Ô∏è This release includes a breaking change. ‚ö†Ô∏è

Starting this version, Dawarich requires PostgreSQL 17 with PostGIS 3.5. If you haven't updated your database image yet, please consider doing so as suggested in the docs on the website. Simply replacing the image in the docker-compose.yml unfortunately doesn't work, as PostgreSQL 17 is not backwards compatible with 14 (which was used in previous versions).

If you have encountered problems with moving to a PostGIS image while still on Postgres 14, I collected a selection of compatible docker images for different CPU architectures, which you can also find in the docs. New users will be automatically provisioned with PostgreSQL 17 with PostGIS 3.5 with default docker-compose.yml file.

You still may use PostgreSQL 14, but no support will be provided for it starting this version. It's strongly recommended to update to PostgreSQL 17.

Changed

  • Dawarich now uses PostgreSQL 17 with PostGIS 3.5 by default.

üíô This release is supported by Steven B., James Manolios, chenrik, aldumil, derpderpington, Chippie, dint, jhalpern, Lex Fradski, Schlufo, cyberswan.at, craftyklaus, JMyrng, Andre, hogenf, naraxius, Lemur, Embrace, martin4861, Alex, evetters, GregF, Jon Coffee, Lukas, Robbie G, Kilian, Hans G, Chris, tabaha, Andre, Michael C and Jonah B. on Patreon and KoFi üíô

What's Changed

  • Update to PostgreSQL 17 and PostGIS 3.5 by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1153
  • 0.26.0 by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1154

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.25.10...0.26.0
